problem_names:
lemma in_cl_tr:
  assumes "R1 \<subseteq> R2"
    and "compatible_l R2 R1"
  shows "trans R1"

lemma in_cr_tr:
  assumes "R1 \<subseteq> R2"
    and "compatible_r R2 R1"
  shows "trans R1"

lemma r_lr:
  assumes "refl R"
  shows "locally_refl R A"

lemma tr_ltr:
  assumes "trans R"
  shows "locally_trans R A B C"

lemma in_lin:
  assumes "R1 \<subseteq> R2"
  shows "locally_included R1 R2 A B"

lemma cl_lcl:
  assumes "compatible_l R1 R2"
  shows "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A B C"

lemma cr_lcr:
  assumes "compatible_r R1 R2"
  shows "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A B C"

lemma lr_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_refl R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_refl R A"

lemma li_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_irrefl R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_irrefl R A"

lemma ls_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_sym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_sym R A"

lemma las_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_antisym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_antisym R A"

lemma lt_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_trans R (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_trans R A C E"

lemma lin_trans_l: 
  assumes "locally_included R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D)"
  shows "locally_included R1 R2 A C"

lemma lcl_trans_l: 
  assumes "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A C E"

lemma lcr_trans_l: 
  assumes "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A C E"

lemma lr_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_refl R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_refl R B"

lemma li_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_irrefl R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_irrefl R B"

lemma ls_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_sym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_sym R B"

lemma las_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_antisym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_antisym R B"

lemma lt_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_trans R (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_trans R B D F"

lemma lin_trans_r: 
  assumes "locally_included R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D)"
  shows "locally_included R1 R2 B D"

lemma lcl_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 B D F"

lemma lcr_trans_r: 
  assumes "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 B D F"

lemma lr_minus:
  assumes "locally_refl R A"
  shows "locally_refl R (A - B)"

lemma li_minus:
  assumes "locally_irrefl R A"
  shows "locally_irrefl R (A - B)"

lemma ls_minus:
  assumes "locally_sym R A"
  shows "locally_sym R (A - B)"

lemma las_minus:
  assumes "locally_antisym R A"
  shows "locally_antisym R (A - B)"

lemma lt_minus:
  assumes "locally_trans R A C E"
  shows "locally_trans R (A - B) (C - D) (E - F)"

lemma lin_minus: 
  assumes "locally_included R1 R2 A C"
  shows "locally_included R1 R2 (A - B) (C - D)"

lemma lcl_minus:
  assumes "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A C E"
  shows "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 (A - B) (C - D) (E - F)"

lemma lcr_minus: 
  assumes "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A C E"
  shows "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 (A - B) (C - D) (E - F)"
lemma mem_restrictI[intro!]: assumes "x \<in> X" "y \<in> X" "(x,y) \<in> R" shows "(x,y) \<in> R \<restriction> X"
lemma mem_restrictD[dest]: assumes "(x,y) \<in> R \<restriction> X" shows "x \<in> X" "y \<in> X" "(x,y) \<in> R"

  shows "trans R1"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. trans R1

proof (state)

proof (state)
this:
  (x, y) \<in> R1
  (y, z) \<in> R1

goal (1 subgoal):

from assms s_x_y

proof (chain)
picking this:

  compatible_l R2 R1

goal (1 subgoal):

this:

goal (1 subgoal):

with s_y_z assms(2)[unfolded compatible_l_def]

proof (chain)

have "(x,z) \<in> R1"

proof (prove)
using this:

  R2 O R1 \<subseteq> R1

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:
  (x, z) \<in> R1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. trans R1

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>(?x2, ?y2) \<in> R1; (?y2, ?z2) \<in> R1\<rbrakk>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. trans R1
then

proof (chain)
picking this:

  \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?z2) \<in> R1
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:

  \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?z2) \<in> R1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. trans R1
unfolding trans_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>(?x2, ?y2) \<in> R1; (?y2, ?z2) \<in> R1\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?x2, ?z2) \<in> R1

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y z.
       (x, y) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow>
       (y, z) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> R1
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  trans R1

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

text\<open>If a property holds globally, it also holds locally. Obviously.\<close>

lemma r_lr:
  assumes "refl R"
  shows "locally_refl R A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_refl R A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  refl R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_refl R A
unfolding refl_on_def locally_refl_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  R \<subseteq> UNIV \<times> UNIV \<and>
  (\<forall>x\<in>UNIV. (x, x) \<in> R)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>a. a \<in># A \<longrightarrow> (a, a) \<in> R
by blast

lemma tr_ltr:
  assumes "trans R"
  shows "locally_trans R A B C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_trans R A B C
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  trans R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_trans R A B C
unfolding trans_def and locally_trans_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>x y z.
     (x, y) \<in> R \<longrightarrow>
     (y, z) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (x, z) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u v.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># B \<longrightarrow>
       v \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow>
       (u, v) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (t, v) \<in> R
by fast

lemma in_lin:
  assumes "R1 \<subseteq> R2"
  shows "locally_included R1 R2 A B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_included R1 R2 A B
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  R1 \<subseteq> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_included R1 R2 A B
unfolding locally_included_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  R1 \<subseteq> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># B \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow> (t, u) \<in> R2
by auto

lemma cl_lcl:
  assumes "compatible_l R1 R2"
  shows "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A B C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A B C
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  compatible_l R1 R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A B C
unfolding compatible_l_def and locally_compatible_l_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  R1 O R2 \<subseteq> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u v.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># B \<longrightarrow>
       v \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow>
       (u, v) \<in> R2 \<longrightarrow> (t, v) \<in> R2
by auto

lemma cr_lcr:
  assumes "compatible_r R1 R2"
  shows "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A B C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A B C
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  compatible_r R1 R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A B C
unfolding compatible_r_def and locally_compatible_r_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  R2 O R1 \<subseteq> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u v.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># B \<longrightarrow>
       v \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R2 \<longrightarrow>
       (u, v) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow> (t, v) \<in> R2
by auto

text\<open>If a predicate holds on a set then it holds on
  all the subsets:\<close>

lemma lr_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_refl R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_refl R A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_refl R A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  locally_refl R (A + B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_refl R A
unfolding locally_refl_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>a. a \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow> (a, a) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>a. a \<in># A \<longrightarrow> (a, a) \<in> R
by auto

lemma li_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_irrefl R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_irrefl R A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_irrefl R A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  locally_irrefl R (A + B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_irrefl R A
unfolding locally_irrefl_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>t. t \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow> (t, t) \<notin> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t. t \<in># A \<longrightarrow> (t, t) \<notin> R
by auto

lemma ls_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_sym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_sym R A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_sym R A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  locally_sym R (A + B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_sym R A
unfolding locally_sym_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>t u.
     t \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     u \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (u, t) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (u, t) \<in> R
by auto

lemma las_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_antisym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_antisym R A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_antisym R A
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  locally_antisym R (A + B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_antisym R A
unfolding locally_antisym_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>t u.
     t \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     u \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (u, t) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> t = u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow>
       (u, t) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> t = u
by auto

lemma lt_trans_l:
  assumes "locally_trans R (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_trans R A C E"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_trans R A C E
using assms[unfolded locally_trans_def, rule_format]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?t \<in># A + B; ?u \<in># C + D; ?v \<in># E + F;
   (?t, ?u) \<in> R; (?u, ?v) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_trans R A C E
unfolding locally_trans_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?t \<in># A + B; ?u \<in># C + D; ?v \<in># E + F;
   (?t, ?u) \<in> R; (?u, ?v) \<in> R\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u v.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       v \<in># E \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow>
       (u, v) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (t, v) \<in> R
by auto

lemma lin_trans_l: 
  assumes "locally_included R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D)"
  shows "locally_included R1 R2 A C"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_included R1 R2 A C
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  locally_included R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_included R1 R2 A C
unfolding locally_included_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>t u.
     t \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     u \<in># C + D \<longrightarrow>
     (t, u) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow> (t, u) \<in> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow> (t, u) \<in> R2
by auto

lemma lcl_trans_l: 
  assumes "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A C E"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A C E
using assms[unfolded locally_compatible_l_def, rule_format]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?t \<in># A + B; ?u \<in># C + D; ?v \<in># E + F;
   (?t, ?u) \<in> R1; (?u, ?v) \<in> R2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_l R1 R2 A C E
unfolding locally_compatible_l_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?t \<in># A + B; ?u \<in># C + D; ?v \<in># E + F;
   (?t, ?u) \<in> R1; (?u, ?v) \<in> R2\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u v.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       v \<in># E \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow>
       (u, v) \<in> R2 \<longrightarrow> (t, v) \<in> R2
by auto

lemma lcr_trans_l: 
  assumes "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 (A + B) (C + D) (E + F)"
  shows "locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A C E"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A C E
using assms[unfolded locally_compatible_r_def, rule_format]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?t \<in># A + B; ?u \<in># C + D; ?v \<in># E + F;
   (?t, ?u) \<in> R2; (?u, ?v) \<in> R1\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_compatible_r R1 R2 A C E
unfolding locally_compatible_r_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?t \<in># A + B; ?u \<in># C + D; ?v \<in># E + F;
   (?t, ?u) \<in> R2; (?u, ?v) \<in> R1\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u v.
       t \<in># A \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># C \<longrightarrow>
       v \<in># E \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R2 \<longrightarrow>
       (u, v) \<in> R1 \<longrightarrow> (t, v) \<in> R2
by auto

lemma las_trans_r:
  assumes "locally_antisym R (A + B)"
  shows "locally_antisym R B"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_antisym R B
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  locally_antisym R (A + B)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. locally_antisym R B
unfolding locally_antisym_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<forall>t u.
     t \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     u \<in># A + B \<longrightarrow>
     (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> (u, t) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> t = u

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>t u.
       t \<in># B \<longrightarrow>
       u \<in># B \<longrightarrow>
       (t, u) \<in> R \<longrightarrow>
       (u, t) \<in> R \<longrightarrow> t = u
by auto

   (?u, ?v) \<in> R1\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?t, ?v) \<in> R2

text \<open>Notations\<close>
notation restrict (infixl "\<restriction>" 80)
lemma mem_restrictI[intro!]: assumes "x \<in> X" "y \<in> X" "(x,y) \<in> R" shows "(x,y) \<in> R \<restriction> X"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> R \<restriction> X
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> X
  y \<in> X
  (x, y) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> R \<restriction> X
unfolding restrict_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> X
  y \<in> X
  (x, y) \<in> R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (x, y) \<in> {(x, y). x \<in> X \<and> y \<in> X \<and> (x, y) \<in> R}
by auto
lemma mem_restrictD[dest]: assumes "(x,y) \<in> R \<restriction> X" shows "x \<in> X" "y \<in> X" "(x,y) \<in> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> X &&& y \<in> X &&& (x, y) \<in> R
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (x, y) \<in> R \<restriction> X

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> X &&& y \<in> X &&& (x, y) \<in> R
unfolding restrict_def
by auto
end
